Title: Immortal Beloved
Actors: Gary Oldman, Jeroen Krabbé, Isabella Rossellini, Johanna ter Steege
Plot: The life and death of the legendary Ludwig van Beethoven. Besides all the work he is known for, the composer once wrote a famous love letter to a nameless beloved, and the movie tries to find out who this beloved was--not easy, as Beethoven has had many women in his life.
